act_pit.actname: Court Jurisdiction and Proceedings Transfer Act

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "proceeding" BEFORE amended by 2010-6-34, effective July 1, 2010.

definition.def: means an action, suit, cause, matter or originating application and includes a procedure and a preliminary motion;

change.changenote: Section 10 (b) (ii) BEFORE amended by 2023-10-134, effective March 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: movable property anywhere of the deceased person if at the time of death he or she was ordinarily resident in British Columbia,
